structure.unit: Motorboats, Other Vessels And Recreational Vehicles

law.catch_line: Automatic Shut Off Nozzle For Motorboat Fuel Dispensing Devices; Fine
law.text: Each pump or other dispensing device used to provide motor fuel for motorboats shall be equipped with an automatic shut-off nozzle which shall not be capable of being locked into an open position. Any violation of this section shall be punished by a fine of not more than five hundred dollars.
